name: Werewolf Quest
description:
Werewolf Quest is a logic game inspired by "Knights and Knaves" puzzles and "Werewolf" party-game (aka Mafia).

The rules are quite simple: each level is a small town which witnessed a cruel murder. You are to transform into Werewolf Hunter, examine all citizens and deduce who is Werewolf. The silver bullet will define his destiny! But beware – you have no right for mistake and if you kill the innocent the game will be over. The start of each level gives a hint how many people will lie to you.

Take your chance!
